item.title: Yarimono
item.description:
Title: Yarimono
Genre: Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: にゅう工房
Publisher: 072 Project
Franchise: 072 Project
Release Date: Aug 30, 2024




About This Game




Over 150 unique monsters! A massive RPG with an abundance of rich content.
Train your monster with the goal of becoming the champion!

Only the main character's partner possesses the cheat move called "Cheat Tackle".
It ensures a guaranteed first strike and a one-hit kill.
In the easy mode, you can even use it endlessly!





In this world, there exists mystical creatures known as "Yarimon".
Known as the loner protagonist with the weakest Yarimon... until now, that is.

In a surprising turn of events, the protagonist's Yarimon partner learned a godly-powerful move with a power level of 800,000 called the "Cheat Tackle".
With this, the protagonist's world completely changed, as this move will one-shot any opponent in battle (though it is only usable once per battle).

Of course, it would be foolish to believe that one can become the champion with just a single move. Therefore, a trainer must continue to hone their skills and diversify their strategies.
With that said, defeating my childhood friend for the first time is already a crazy accomplishment.
I can finally get back some of the money I lost to her...

Afterwards, I set out on an adventure after my childhood friend told me she was going on a journey and pressured me to do the same.



As I am adventuring, I slowly unravel the secret of this world.
This is when I felt like my journey had really begun.

Aim to complete the Yarimon Encyclopedia (Yaridex)!!





Monster-taming RPG
Collect a variety of Yarimon and strive relentlessly towards the championship!

Gain EXP by battling either wild Yarimon or trainers.
With the advent of EXP shards, you will also be able to freely allocate EXP to your favorite Yarimon!

Uncover the truth and secrets that are hidden within this world!

Explore the secrets hidden in this world, gradually unveiling it's truth!

  • Over 150 monsters
  • Pixel art for each character
  • Illustrations for each character along with various facial expressions
  • Having a monster index





Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The game contains virtual and unrealistic combat violence and slightly revealing clothing.



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
    • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
    • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 4 GB available space

item.title: Visions of Mana
item.description:
Title: Visions of Mana
Genre: Action , RPG
Developer: Square Enix
Publisher: Square Enix
Franchise: Mana Series
Release Date: Aug 29, 2024




About This Game

Visions of Mana is a brand new title in this series revolving around the sacred sword and mana.
The protagonist Val and his childhood friend Hinna, the newly appointed Alm of Fire, set off on a journey to the Mana Tree.

This game’s iconic vibrant and vast semi-open field contains adorable yet ferocious monsters, allowing you to enjoy swift three-dimensional battles using the power of the Elementals.
Through adventures with friends met along the way, they start to see the truth about the world.
Must we accept our fates?

A new “Mana” tale begins here as a classic fantasy series returns to its roots.

▸Bold graphics full of characteristic “Mana” flair
The characters journey across a vibrant world alive with spirits.

▸Exploring the world
Explore the vast, semi-open world that stretches as far as the eye can see. Traverse the environment quickly and safely with new companions, the “Pikuls".

▸Harness the power of the Elementals
In this game, you will fight enemies using weapons that house the power of the Elementals. Change between different classes and characters to suit your playstyle and enjoy combat that has evolved both three-dimensionally and strategically.

▸ Breathtaking and immersive soundtrack
Around 100 background music tracks by a talented team of creators who have worked on countless tracks throughout the series. The music in field areas feature interactive music, heightening the mood for adventure.
Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 64-bit
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i5-6400
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 580 / Intel® Arc™ A580 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB VRAM
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 45 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1920x1080, Graphics Preset "Low", 30FPS
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows® 10 / 11 64-bit
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 3500 / Intel® Core™ i5-8500
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 XT / Intel® Arc™ A580 / NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2070
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 45 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1920x1080, Graphics Preset "High", 60FPS

item.title: MEMORIAPOLIS
item.description:
Title: MEMORIAPOLIS
Genre: Indie , Simulation , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: 5PM Studio
Publisher: 5PM Studio
Release Date: Aug 29, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Aug 29, 2024




About This Game



  • From Antiquity to the Age of Enlightenment: lay the foundations of your city, experience critical moments in history and transform your city into the Capital of Capital!
  • Each Age introduces its own game mechanics, presenting a distinct set of opportunities and challenges for the player's dynasty to navigate.
  • Traces from one age can be integrated into the next one.



  • No need to worry about laying roads!
  • Thanks to our unique algorithm, overseen by an urban planner, you can create the most realistic-looking city you've ever seen in a video game!
  • Quarters, factions, Age transitions... Your choices will shape your town's future!



  • Your inhabitants will have needs and expectations. Rely on buildings such as farms, cutting camps and quarries to ensure the livelihood of your pioneers.
  • Use your creativity and strategic skills to manage administrative and political centers to interact with your population.
  • Take the Senatus for instance : once built, you can propose and fund decrees, which will impact your city for short periods!



  • Face historical events like the Black Death and manage internal events such as riots and strikes that could lead to losing the game!
  • Build wonders like the Great Library of Alexandria, Windsor Castle, the Leaning Tower of Pisa, the Palace of Versailles and more to showcase your wealth and power throughout the ages!
  • The culture you choose will impact your city and offer significant replayability. Will you choose to be a craftsman, the influence of a politician, the mind of a philosopher, or something else?

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: AMD RYZEN 7 5800 X or Intel equivalent
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 6 GB available space
    • Sound Card:
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: AMD RYZEN 7 5800 X or Intel equivalent
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVidia GTX 2070 or AMD equivalent
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 6 GB available space

item.title: WARCANA
item.description:
Title: WARCANA
Genre: Indie , Strategy
Developer: 1000 Orks
Publisher: Team17
Franchise: Team17
Release Date: Aug 29, 2024




About This Game



WARCANA is a fantasy inspired real-time base defence strategy game with a unique deck-building mechanic. Take on the role of a mighty magician and face the challenge of surviving waves of unrelenting attacks whilst simultaneously summoning your own large armies. Lay waste to your rivals in either a battle-royale with up to 30 other players, or in a series of single player campaigns.

Build your deck. Prepare your defences. Summon your armies. Survive the onslaught. Will you be the last one standing?





All cards have their own tech trees, with abilities ranging from summoning buildings, units, or casting spells. More cards are unlocked from summoned economy buildings, so be sure to play your cards right and consider your tech tree route in order to have ferocious monsters, destructive spells and more at your command. Choose poorly however, and you'll be left vulnerable to being overrun with just the round timer to save your base.





Challenge yourself in a single player campaign featuring 30+ scenarios, or create your own using the in-game editor. The single player campaign makes it easy to learn the basics, understand how the devotions differ from one other and really hone the craft of a mighty mage.





Be the last one standing in a Battle Royale against up to 30 players, where at any given time each player faces off against two direct opponents. An additional Horde Mode has players race to get the highest kill score and in the Stream Sniper mode, players can experience epic social moments as part of an online community playing against streamers.





Summon hundreds of thousands of units to your army as a maelstrom of monsters simultaneously cause extensive destruction to your own defences. The different devotion and unit types add further considerations in breaking through to your opponent's bases.





Sow the seeds of mythical forces as a "Fay Caller", spread demonic dread as a champion of "Occultism", or unleash other cosmic horrors from the other selection of fantastical devotions. Each has their own unique devotion perk, gameplay mechanic and distinct theming. Selecting primary and secondary devotions for multicoloured decks adds further depth and variety to how the battles play out.

Supported by

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, 4 GB or AMD Radeon RX 560, 4 GB or Intel Arc A380, 6 GB
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Low 1080p @ 60 FPS
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, 4 GB or AMD Radeon RX 560, 4 GB or Intel Arc A380, 6 GB
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
